applicable_legislation.description: The legislation that mandates the creation or management of the Catalog.

catalogue.description: A catalogue whose contents are of interest in the context of this catalogue.

creator.description: An entity responsible for the creation of the catalogue.

description.description: A free-text account of the Catalogue.

geographical_coverage.description: A geographical area covered by the Catalogue.

has_dataset.description: A Dataset that is part of the Catalogue.

has_part.description: A related Catalogue that is part of the described Catalogue.

homepage.description: A web page that acts as the main page for the Catalogue.

language.description: A language used in the textual metadata describing titles, descriptions, etc. of the Datasets in the Catalogue.

licence.description: A licence under which the Catalogue can be used or reused.

modification_date.description: The most recent date on which the Catalogue was modified.

publisher.description: An entity (organisation) responsible for making the Catalogue available.

record.description: A Catalogue Record that is part of the Catalogue.

release_date.description: The date of formal issuance (e.g., publication) of the Catalogue.

rights.description: A statement that specifies rights associated with the Catalogue.

service.description: A site or end-point (Data Service) that is listed in the Catalogue.

temporal_coverage.description: A temporal period that the Catalogue covers.

themes.description: A knowledge organization system used to classify the Resources that are in the Catalogue.

title.description: A name given to the Catalogue.

application_profile.description: An Application Profile that the Catalogued Resource's metadata conforms to.

change_type.description: The status of the catalogue record in the context of editorial flow of the dataset and data service descriptions.

description.description: A free-text account of the record. This property can be repeated for parallel language versions of the description.

language.description: A language used in the textual metadata describing titles, descriptions, etc. of the Catalogued Resource.

listing_date.description: The date on which the description of the Resource was included in the Catalogue.

modification_date.description: The most recent date on which the Catalogue entry was changed or modified.

primary_topic.description: A link to the Dataset, Data service or Catalog described in the record.

source_metadata.description: The original metadata that was used in creating metadata for the Dataset, Data Service or Dataset Series.

title.description: A name given to the Catalogue Record.

algorithm.description: The algorithm used to produce the subject Checksum.

checksum_value.description: A lower case hexadecimal encoded digest value produced using a specific algorithm.

preferred_label.description: A preferred label of the concept.

title.description: A name of the concept scheme.

access_rights.description: Information regarding access or restrictions based on privacy, security, or other policies.

applicable_legislation.description: The legislation that mandates the creation or management of the Data Service.

conforms_to.description: An established (technical) standard to which the Data Service conforms.

contact_point.description: Contact information that can be used for sending comments about the Data Service.

description.description: A free-text account of the Data Service.

documentation.description: A page or document about this Data Service

endpoint_URL.description: The root location or primary endpoint of the service (an IRI).

endpoint_description.description: A description of the services available via the end-points, including their operations, parameters etc.

format.description: The structure that can be returned by querying the endpointURL.

keyword.description: A keyword or tag describing the Data Service.

landing_page.description: A web page that provides access to the Data Service and/or additional information.

licence.description: A licence under which the Data service is made available.

publisher.description: An entity (organisation) responsible for making the Data Service available.

serves_dataset.description: This property refers to a collection of data that this data service can distribute.

theme.description: A category of the Data Service.

title.description: A name given to the Data Service.

access_rights.description: Information that indicates whether the Dataset is publicly accessible, has access restrictions or is not public.

applicable_legislation.description: The legislation that mandates the creation or management of the Dataset.

conforms_to.description: An implementing rule or other specification.

contact_point.description: Contact information that can be used for sending comments about the Dataset.

creator.description: An entity responsible for producing the dataset.

dataset_distribution.description: An available Distribution for the Dataset.

description.description: A free-text account of the Dataset.

documentation.description: A page or document about this Dataset.

frequency.description: The frequency at which the Dataset is updated.

geographical_coverage.description: A geographic region that is covered by the Dataset.

has_version.description: A related Dataset that is a version, edition, or adaptation of the described Dataset.

identifier.description: The main identifier for the Dataset, e.g. the URI or other unique identifier in the context of the Catalogue.

in_series.description: A dataset series of which the dataset is part.

is_referenced_by.description: A related resource, such as a publication, that references, cites, or otherwise points to the dataset.

keyword.description: A keyword or tag describing the Dataset.

landing_page.description: A web page that provides access to the Dataset, its Distributions and/or additional information.

modification_date.description: The most recent date on which the Dataset was changed or modified.

other_identifier.description: A secondary identifier of the Dataset

provenance.description: A statement about the lineage of a Dataset.

publisher.description: An entity (organisation) responsible for making the Dataset available.

qualified_attribution.description: An Agent having some form of responsibility for the resource.

qualified_relation.description: A description of a relationship with another resource.

release_date.description: The date of formal issuance (e.g., publication) of the Dataset.

sample.description: A sample distribution of the dataset.

source.description: A related Dataset from which the described Dataset is derived.

spatial_resolution.description: The minimum spatial separation resolvable in a dataset, measured in meters.

temporal_coverage.description: A temporal period that the Dataset covers.

temporal_resolution.description: The minimum time period resolvable in the dataset.

title.description: A name given to the Dataset.

version.description: The version indicator (name or identifier) of a resource.

version_notes.description: A description of the differences between this version and a previous version of the Dataset.

was_generated_by.description: An activity that generated, or provides the business context for, the creation of the dataset.

applicable_legislation.description: The legislation that mandates the creation or management of the Dataset Series.

contact_point.description: Contact information that can be used for sending comments about the Dataset Series.

description.description: A free-text account of the Dataset Series.

frequency.description: The frequency at which the Dataset Series is updated.

geographical_coverage.description: A geographic region that is covered by the Dataset Series.

modification_date.description: The most recent date on which the Dataset Series was changed or modified.

publisher.description: An entity (organisation) responsible for ensuring the coherency of the Dataset Series

release_date.description: The date of formal issuance (e.g., publication) of the Dataset Series.

temporal_coverage.description: A temporal period that the Dataset Series covers.

title.description: A name given to the Dataset Series.

enum: Justice, legal system and public safety
DatasetThemes.title: DatasetThemes

access_URL.description: A URL that gives access to a Distribution of the Dataset.

access_service.description: A data service that gives access to the distribution of the dataset.

applicable_legislation.description: The legislation that mandates the creation or management of the Distribution.

availability.description: An indication how long it is planned to keep the Distribution of the Dataset available.

byte_size.description: The size of a Distribution in bytes.

checksum.description: A mechanism that can be used to verify that the contents of a distribution have not changed.

compression_format.description: The format of the file in which the data is contained in a compressed form, e.g. to reduce the size of the downloadable file.

description.description: A free-text account of the Distribution.

documentation.description: A page or document about this Distribution.

download_URL.description: A URL that is a direct link to a downloadable file in a given format.

format.description: The file format of the Distribution.

has_policy.description: The policy expressing the rights associated with the distribution if using the [[ODRL]] vocabulary.

language.description: A language used in the Distribution.

licence.description: A licence under which the Distribution is made available.

linked_schemas.description: An established schema to which the described Distribution conforms.

media_type.description: The media type of the Distribution as defined in the official register of media types managed by IANA.

modification_date.description: The most recent date on which the Distribution was changed or modified.

packaging_format.description: The format of the file in which one or more data files are grouped together, e.g. to enable a set of related files to be downloaded together.

release_date.description: The date of formal issuance (e.g., publication) of the Distribution.

rights.description: A statement that specifies rights associated with the Distribution.

spatial_resolution.description: The minimum spatial separation resolvable in a dataset distribution, measured in meters.

status.description: The status of the distribution in the context of maturity lifecycle.

temporal_resolution.description: The minimum time period resolvable in the dataset distribution.

title.description: A name given to the Distribution.

notation.description: A string that is an identifier in the context of the identifier scheme referenced by its datatype.

type.description: A type of licence, e.g. indicating 'public domain' or 'royalties required'.

bbox.description: The geographic bounding box of a resource.

centroid.description: The geographic center (centroid) of a resource.

geometry.description: The corresponding geometry for a resource.

beginning.description: The beginning of a period or interval.

end.description: The end of a period or interval.

had_role.description: A function of an entity or agent with respect to another entity or resource.

relation.description: A resource related to the source resource.

SupportiveEntity.description: The supportive entities are supporting the main entities in the Application Profile. They are included in the Application Profile because they form the range of properties.
SupportiveEntity.title: SupportiveEntity
